title: when you know this support isn't much of a hope
body:
So I have a sweeping and he has a ruby sightstone, 40 mins in and he says this when i tell him to ward our top half and baron


...

He was also salty the entire game and toxic, seriously a put off, left his name out due to the no name and shame policy

replies.body: Ehhh yeah thats true tho its not just the supports job to ward now a days the team should either be going sweepers or the upgraded blue trinket  because supports can only place 3 wards befor having to go back ontop of that they have to risk going into a jungle without everyone contributing to vision.... and i mean if  he said u had no controll over ur jungle then its clearly a multitude of issues going on tht game......i mean if i saw u being picked off in jungle and mid and top and u not even attempting to ward id  only ward the objectives because its a team game.. to me it seems ur the toxic one pointing that out without showing us the whole game history

He didn't have a single ward on the entire map whilst having a ruby sightstone and and blue trinket

I have a sweeper to take out the wards at objectives, and am the only one on the team with the sweeper

How am I supposed to ward? He has a trinket and a ruby sightstone that he NEVER used ONCE the entire game

The blitz rank missed soooo many flash hooks, then proceeded to blame ADC for not 'pressuring them' into the right position, what is he, the carry now? 

He later proceeded to pull the enemy tank Darius and Warwick into our team while being right next to or ADC, who ofc gets immediately Ulted by Warwick

He then proceeds to blame us saying 'focus the guys I hook, landed so many good hooks but you waste them'
So apparently the fact that me and lux are focusing the enemy Lucian and Diana is a bad idea, and we should focus the Darius and Warwick who stacked mr and also a thornmail

THEN he proceeds to say THIS whilst not having put down an single ward this entire game, with the exception of bot lane bush

And also, yes I placed as many Pinks as I could during the early stages since blitz crank was being a dick, but this happened when it was in the late stages of the game where all my item slots were full
The instant anyone refuses to ward is where you know they are a hopelessly lost cause.
